title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 413 - Procedures And Requirements For Mortgage Brokers To Act As Fha Mortgage Loan Correspondents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 413 - Procedures And Requirements For Mortgage Brokers To Act As Fha Mortgage Loan Correspondents

State Regulations
§ 413.1 - Authorization to act as an FHA mortgage loan correspondent
§ 413.2 - Definitions
§ 413.3 - Minimum standards required for approval
§ 413.4 - Application procedures for mortgage brokers to obtain the approval of the superintendent to make fha insured mortgage loans
§ 413.5 - Approval or denial of applications to make fha insured mortgage loans
§ 413.6 - Duties of a mortgage broker approved to act as an fha mortgage loan correspondent
§ 413.7 - Duties of a sponsor
§ 413.8 - Suspension or termination of approval to act as an fha mortgage loan correspondent

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 413

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §590
[5-a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
